content.rendered:
Wood-be wonderful. Designed to mix and match with the entire Hand Made Modern line, ready-to-finish pine bases are the perfect foundation for any craft project. Just add Hand Made Modern fabric, paints and embellishments — or all 3 — to take our quality wood bases from basic to beyond beautiful.

Hand Made Hint: Embroider a monogram for the perfect personalized gift. Instructions included.

excerpt.rendered:
Number of Pieces: 2
Includes: Instructions, 1 Needle
Features: Non-toxic
Dimensions: 2.875H x 3.875W x 3.875L
Weight: .5
